Gian Luca Buoncompagni

[1, 2]

Engineering Manager and Front End Specialist

[1, 2]

I am a web front-end specialist and Engineering Manager with more than 20 years of experience, dedicated to building fast, responsive, and high-performance web applications [1, 2]. As a seasoned leader, I have a proven track record of directing diverse, international engineering teams to deliver complex, feature-rich SaaS platforms [1, 3].

Currently, I serve as the Head of Front End, 3D, and Customer Integration at Tailoor (Successori Reda S.p.a.) in Milan, Italy [3-5].

Professional Experience

Tailoor Multi-Brand E-Commerce Platform

Engineering Manager | React • TypeScript • Micro-Frontend Architecture

[6]
  • Architected a scalable front-end infrastructure utilizing an Nx monorepo for efficient code management and Webpack Module Federation for a micro-frontend architecture [5, 7, 8].
  • Led the engineering teams in managing 40+ micro-applications and 15+ shared libraries serving luxury brands [6, 9, 10].
  • Pioneered immersive 3D product visualization experiences using Three.js and React Three Fiber, including custom Draco compression pipelines [7, 11, 12].
  • Managed global third-party integrations including payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Klarna, Apple/Google Pay), analytics (GTM), and subscription systems (Chargebee) [11, 13, 14].
  • Established a mature DevOps culture using Azure Pipelines for CI/CD, enforcing high code quality with Husky, ESLint, and Prettier [11, 15, 16].

Vivaticket

Head of Front End (2018 – 2020)

[17]
  • In charge of shaping the client-side development of the new international B2C portal (vivaticket.com) and managing the development team [2, 4, 17].
  • Coordinated with international teams for integration with existing ticketing engine systems [2, 17].

Editoriale Il Fatto Quotidiano

Senior Front End Developer (2014 – 2018)

[18]
  • Led the redesign and development of the main website, serving 1.6 million daily page views [4, 18].
